name: SUPER NINJA NOODLE CHEF
description:
What's better than a normal, common chef? What's cooler than a normal Ninja?

A SUPER NINJA NOODLE CHEF

Swing around the environment, run, jump and get the keys to advance in your ninja training and make long noodles by swinging in them, but be careful if you do it too long, you will have to make a new noodle

This game was created for the "Tu juego a  Juicio" jam with the theme of "Demasiado Largo"

Controls: WASD or arrows and mouse

Music by Adam Morton: https://www.adammortonmusic.com/

Cover by TricksterBun : https://twitter.com/tricksterbun

Game by Erizux: https://www.instagram.com/erizux.dev/

If you would like to play it more often, I recommend you download the downloadable version since it has a saving system and you can give me a cookie by making a donation
